generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings, which is the primary surface for vehicle travel.
- sidewalk: There is a sidewalk on the right side of the road, separated from the road by a curb and a wall.
- wall: A concrete wall with graffiti runs along the right side of the road, acting as a barrier.
- fence: A metal fence is visible along the left side of the road, running parallel to the road.
- pole: Several poles are visible along the road, including one with a bicycle sign.
- traffic sign: A blue circular traffic sign with a white bicycle symbol is mounted on a pole.
- vegetation: There are numerous trees and greenery visible along both sides of the road and in the background.
- terrain: Grass and some weeds are visible along the edges of the sidewalk and road.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the trees in the background.
- car: A white car is visible driving on the road in the foreground.
- person: A person is visible inside the white car, driving it.
